func localIP() (string,error) {
conn, err := net.Dial("udp", "8.8.8.8:80")
if err != nil {
log.Error("Get local ip error.",err)
return "",err
}
defer conn.Close()
localAddr := conn.LocalAddr().(*net.UDPAddr)
localIP := localAddr.IP.String()
log.Info("Local IP : ",localIP)
return localIP,nil
}
